name: Black Widow

abilities.name: Grappling Hook
abilities.details: Fires a grappling hook to quickly pull herself towards terrain.

abilities.name: Widow's Bite
abilities.details: Releases an electric charge, damaging and briefly shocking enemies.

ultimate.name: Infiltrate
ultimate.effect: Grants invisibility, increased movement speed, and silent footsteps for 6 seconds.
ultimate.details: Uses espionage skills to become unseen and reposition.

passives.name: Acrobatics
passives.details: Moves faster while crouching. Quieter footsteps generally.

teamups.effect: Using Grappling Hook near these allies grants them a brief speed boost.

lore: Natasha Romanoff, a former KGB assassin turned S.H.I.E.L.D. agent and Avenger. She is a master spy, martial artist, and marksman, equipped with various gadgets.

comics.title: Black Widow (various series, particularly by Waid/Samnee)
